title: Zeek - Network Observations
description: -   This dashboard provides details for network observations such as Known Hosts, Known SSL Certificates, Known Modbus, Known Services, and Software being used on the network.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides details for network observations such as Known Hosts, Known SSL Certificates, Known Modbus, Known Services and Software being used on the network.

## Widgets
1. Total Known Certificates
2. SSL Certificates Log Details
3. Known Hosts
4. Host Discovered Over Time
5. Known Hosts Log Details
6. Top 10 Hosts
7. Device Types
8. Known Modbus Log Details
9. Top 10 Protocols Used by Services
10. Top 10 Known Services
11. Top 10 Hosts With Port and Protocol
12. Known Services Log Details
13. Software by Type
14. Software by Host
15. Top 10 Software
16. Software Log Details

definition.title: Top 10 Hosts With Port and Protocol
